 void onTouch(int x, int y, boolean hotspot)
          Called each time the engine recognizes any touch on screen
 void onTouchDown(int x, int y, boolean hotspot)
          Called each time the engine recognizes a touch down on screen
 void onTouchUp(int x, int y, boolean hotspot)
          Called each time the engine recognizes a touch up on screen
 void startAccelerometer()
          Starts the Accelerometer class, and will trigger the onAccelerometerChanged and onAccelerometerShake events Anything that needs to be changed with the accelerometer can be done through the static Accelerometer class
 void stopAccelerometer()
          Stops the Accelerometer from listening, this should be done when it is not needed, to save processing time

createEngine

public void createEngine(int width,
                         int height,
                         boolean landscape)
Starts the engine without a loading screen

Parameters:
width - the width to calibrate the coordaintes to
height - the height to calibrate coordinates to
landscape - TRUE if screen is to be locked landscape, FALSE if locked portrait

createEngine

public void createEngine(java.lang.String loadingScreen,
                         int width,
                         int height,
                         boolean landscape)
Starts the engine with a loading screen

Parameters:
loadingScreen - path to the loading screen, from the /assets/ folder
width - the width to calibrate the coordinates to
height - the height to calibrate coordinates to
landscape - TRUE if the screen is to be locked landscape, FALSE if locked portrait

onKeyDown

public boolean onKeyDown(int keyCode,
                         KeyEvent event)

startAccelerometer

public void startAccelerometer()
Starts the Accelerometer class, and will trigger the onAccelerometerChanged and onAccelerometerShake events Anything that needs to be changed with the accelerometer can be done through the static Accelerometer class

stopAccelerometer

public void stopAccelerometer()
Stops the Accelerometer from listening, this should be done when it is not needed, to save processing time
